name: image-metadata-remover
title: Image Metadata Remover
description: Strip all metadata from images for privacy protection
content:
Overview

This application removes all EXIF metadata from images to protect your privacy. Built using Pillow, it strips GPS coordinates, camera information, timestamps, and other metadata while preserving the image quality.

Features

  • Remove all EXIF metadata from images
  • Strip GPS location data for privacy
  • Remove camera make, model, and settings
  • Remove timestamps and creation dates
  • Preserve original image quality and pixels

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the cleaned image

Output

The application generates a cleaned image with the suffix _no_metadata in the specified output directory. The image pixels remain identical to the original.

Use Cases

  • Protecting privacy before sharing photos online
  • Removing GPS coordinates from images
  • Preparing images for public posting
  • Anonymizing photos for privacy reasons
  • Complying with data protection regulations
